original_title: Epica: We Will Take You With Us
overview: We Will Take You With Us is the first DVD released by the Dutch symphonic metal band Epica. It contains material from their debut album, The Phantom Agony, As well as a cover of Memory from the musical Cats. The video was recorded for 2 Meter Sessies, a Dutch live music television show. The title of this release is taken from the lyrics of "Fa√ßade of Reality".
title: Epica: We Will Take You With Us
